flawed_nl_solution:
He loses 60*0.1=<<60*0.1=6>>6 bars to taxes
That means he has 60-6=<<60-6=58>>58 bars after taxes
So he has 58/2=<<58/2=29>>29 bars after the divorce
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 58. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
